question: The government of Maharashtra announced the Damanganga-Pinjal project will meet the water demand of Mumbai till which of the following year?
explanation: The government of Maharashtra announced the Damanganga-Pinjal project will meet the water demand of Mumbai till the year 2060. The Daman Ganga-Pinjal River Linking Project links the Daman Ganga River to the Pinjal reservoir.
